Issue.creator: skarim
Issue.summary: Dynamically generate doc for CLI and Config files
Issue.description: A lot of manual maintenance of fabric-ca documentation is required if any changes to CLI or Configuration files are made to either client or server. Keeping the document in sync with any new or removed configuration option will be easier if there is a script to generate separate files that contain CLI and Config that can be pointed to from the mean fabric-ca documentation.
